spec_data.Name: nhn-nanum-gothic-light-fonts
spec_data.Description:
Nanum Gothic Light is an addition to Korean "Nanum Gothic" font
family.  It provides very thin glyphs which are useful for graphic
designs in some cases.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 01:27:26 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Nanum Gothic Light family of Korean TrueType fonts
